name: Lumberjack's End
description:
Submission to the 3 Day Mini-Jam 103: Darkness game jam!

The limitation was "You are your own enemy"

Help Jim survive the incoming asteroid by simply running! There's an ever-changing forest to get through, so use that axe to get past those pesky trees (bane of jim's existence)!!

Once you're safe, do it again, although the next time it's a bit different. You'll have to complete with Jim again (You)?

Avoid those Jim ghost's just as much as that impending asteroid of doommm!

How to play:

  • Run from the circle! There's an asteroid coming! (jim runs towards the cursor)
  • Those ghosts are you, but the bad version :(, don't go near them!
  • Use your axe when things get tricky (left mouse click)
